DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate clinical efficacy transcranial magnetic stimulation treatment Depersonalization Disorder ( DPD ) .
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Depersonalization Disorder With Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS )
DOC.detailed_description: This study research trial outpatient , non-medication , non-invasive investigational treatment call Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) . TMS apply magnetic field brain brief period time . TMS procedure involve 30 minute-long daily session every weekday series week . The investigator test whether TMS treat Depersonalization Disorder ( DPD ) . This open-label study . All patient receive active treatment . DPD symptom monitor weekly self-report questionnaire well clinical rating doctor .
DOC.criteria: Male female outpatient , 18 70 year age . Primary diagnosis Depersonalization Disorder . Duration index episode least year . Patients currently DPD medication must stable dose ( ) least 2 month continue dose ( ) duration study . Capable willing provide inform consent Individuals neurological disorder include , limited : brain lesion ; history seizure ; history cerebrovascular accident ; history stroke ; cerebral aneurysm , Dementia ; Parkinson 's Disease ; Huntington 's chorea ; Multiple Sclerosis . Increased risk seizure reason , include prior head trauma loss consciousness 5 minute . Cardiac pacemaker , implanted medication pump , intracardiac line , acute , unstable cardiac disease . Intracranial implant ( e.g . aneurysms clip , shunt , stimulators , cochlear implant , electrode ) metal object within near head , exclude mouth , safely remove . If participate psychotherapy , must stable treatment least three month prior entry study , anticipation change frequency therapeutic session , therapeutic focus duration rTMS trial . Known suspected pregnancy . Women breastfeed
